content: In chess, castling may only be carried out when both the king and the involved rook have not been moved, all the squares between them are free and not dominated by any opposing piece and the king is not in check and would not be put in check by castling.
translations: ita:Negli scacchi, l'arrocco pu√≤ essere eseguito solo quando sia il re che la torre coinvolta non sono stati mossi, tutti gl
